name: lib/Gab.js
constructor
description: Create a new Gab client.

params.name: options.stringify
params.description: (Optional) If true, will return stringified JSON.

params.name: options.timeout
params.description: (Optional) Specify a custom timeout. Default 5000 milliseconds.

name: me
description:
Returns the user's account information.
Requires 'read' scope.

name: user
description:
Returns a user's profile.
Requires 'read' scope.

name: followers
description:
Returns a user's followers.
Requires 'read' scope.

name: following
description:
Returns a user's followed.
Requires 'read' scope.

name: notifications
description:
Returns a user's notifications.
Requires 'notifications' scope.

name: userFeed
description:
Returns a user's feed.
Requires the 'read' scope.

name: popularFeed
description:
Returns the popular feed.
Requires the 'read' scope.

name: popularUsers
description:
Returns popular users.
Requires the 'read' scope.

name: follow
description:
Follow a user.
Requires the 'engage-user' scope.

name: unfollow
description:
Unfollow a user.
Requires the 'engage-user' scope.

name: upvote
description:
Upvote a post.
Requires the 'engage-post' scope.

name: removeUpvote
description:
Remove an upvote for a post.
Requires the 'engage-post' scope.

name: downvote
description:
Downvote a post.
Requires the 'engage-post' scope.

name: removeDownvote
description:
Remove a downvote for a post.
Requires the 'engage-post' scope.

name: repost
description:
Repost a post.
Requires the 'engage-post' scope.

name: removeRepost
description:
Remove a repost.
Requires the 'engage-post' scope.

name: postDetails
description:
Returns a post's details.
Requires the 'engage-post' scope.

name: popularGroups
description:
Returns popular groups.
Requires the 'read' scope.

name: groupDetails
description:
Returns a group's details.
Requires the 'read' scope.

name: groupUsers
description:
Returns a group's users.
Requires the 'read' scope.

name: groupModerationLogs
description:
Returns a group's moderation logs.
Requires the 'read' scope.

name: createMediaAttachment
description:
Creates a media attachment.
Requires the 'write-posts' scope.

name: createPost
description: Create a new post.

params.name: options.media_attachments[]
params.description: Media attachment ID created using createMediaAttachment. Up to four attachments.

params.name: options.reply_to
params.description: Id of the post to reply to.

params.name: options.is_quote
params.description: 1 if you want to create this as a quote.

params.name: options.premium_min_tier
params.description: Used to mark a premium post. Amount, in cents, that user's should pay monthly for this post to be visible.

params.name: options.group
params.description: ID of group to post to.

params.name: options.poll
params.description: 1 if you want to add a poll. Requires poll_option_1 and poll_option_2. poll_option_3 and poll_option_4 are optional.

content:
# Gab API Wrapper
This wrapper allows easy access to the Gab.com API. It uses Axios to make GET, POST, and DELETE requests to their API and returns their results. All avaialble endpoints are avaialable within this wrapper.
You will need to use OAuth2 to retrieve your users' auth token, which is then passed into the wrapper. More information is available on their documentation.

## Links
- [Documentation](https://gavkaz.github.io/Gab-API-Wrapper/)
- [Gab Documentation](https://developers.gab.com/)

## Prerequisites
- Register a Gab.com account at [Gab.com](https://gab.com/)
- Purchase Pro from Gab's store. Pro is currently require to access Gab's API.
- Visit User -> Settings and create a developer application.
- Authenticate your user with their OAuth2 endpoint and get their auth token.
name: ./README.md
